SENT.plain: An 11-yr-old patient was scanned 96 hr after the administration of gallium-67 (67Ga)
The scan emulated the biodistribution of a typical bone-seeking radipharmaceutical-rather than that of 67Ga
None of the factors previously identified with alteration of the biodistribution of 67Ga were found
However, the patient had been injected with gadopentetate in conjunction with magnetic resonance imaging 4 hr before receiving the 67Ga
Gadolinium appears to cause a strong carrier-like effect in 67Ga scans
